overview: Caesar reenters Rome where he meets his old flame Servilia and restablishes his relationship with the woman. Azia worried by the love story between them, covers all the walls of Rome with sketches of Caesar practicing sex with Servilia. In Rome, fights between Azia and Servilia become more and more deceitful and perverse. Meanwhile Lucio and Tito anticipate Caesar and they comes back to Rome. Tito decides to free the enslaved Odessa.
title: Roma 2
